Detailed Description

This class handles loading dynamic classes out of the data directory.

def dynamicclassmanager.DynamicClassManager.loadDynamicClass (   self,
  path 
)

Load a class from the named module.

Assumes that the module includes a function getClassName() that indicates the name of the class to load.

Maps class names to their creation functions so we don't have to call __import__ every time we want a given class.
